heading: Hand Wash & Dry
description: A full wash of the exterior including a detailed wheel clean, windows are cleaned from the outside.

heading: Mini Valet
description: A full wash and wax for the exterior with a detailed wheel clean, the interior is vacuumed and wiped and the windows are cleaned.

heading: California Valet
description: As mini valet, but air-lined to stop drip marks and a detailed exhaust clean.

heading: Midi Valet
description: As California valet but with a surface enhancing wax, to create an attractive gloss.

heading: Interior Valet
description: Detailed work on the interior trim including carpet and upholstery shampoo. Leather is cleaned and conditioned.

heading: Exterior Valet (Hand Polish)
description: Detailed work on the exterior, hand polished 6 ways on the paintwork. Chrome trims, rubber trims and detailed wheel clean. Interior is vacuumed and wiped and the windows are cleaned.

heading: Exterior Valet (Machine Polish)
description: Detailed work on the exterior, hand polished 6 ways on the paintwork. Chrome trims, rubber trims and detailed wheel clean. Interior is vacuumed and wiped and the windows are cleaned.

heading: Showroom Valet
description: Detailed work on the interior and exterior. Hand polished 6 ways on the paintwork. Chrome trims, rubber trims and detailed wheel clean. Interior carpet and upholstery shampoo. Leather is cleaned and conditioned. Windows are cleaned.

heading: Alloy Wheel Refurbishment
description: Kerbed, scuffed or corroded Alloy wheels are refurbished to look as good as new. This service is a quick and easy way to get your alloy wheels back to factory condition and remove the unwanted marks from driving, parking and everyday use.

heading: Diamond Cut Polished Wheels
description: A process for repairing polished wheels on a specialist machine. Wheel inserts are repaired if damaged or can be changed colour.

heading: Colour Change
description:
Alloy wheels can be colour coded or painted to any desired colour, no matter how loud or outrageous it may be. The most popular trends include:

  • Black or gray for a more sporty look.
  • Colour coding to match the bodywork.
  • Personalised colour coding to make your vehicle more unique.
  • Diamond cut wheels are also customisable. The painted inserts and polished face can create a two layer effect and
  • complements each other beautifully.

The wheels are painted on the face and inside. Price includes repair to any damage on the wheels.

heading: Alloy Wheel Straightening
description:
Driving over pot holes can lead to your wheels becoming buckled. Alloy wheels can be straightened using our specialist hydraulic equipment.

Signs that your wheel(s) may be buckled include:

  • Vibration of the car when moving.
  • Deflation of the tyres.
  • Dents, leaks and rusting to the wheel.
  • Suspension failure.
